verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> The burden נִֽינְוֵ֑ה <S%H5210><s%> of Nineveh סֵ֧פֶר <S%H5612><s%> The book חֲז֛וֹן <S%H2377><s%> of the vision נַח֖וּם <S%H5151><s%> of Nahum הָאֶלְקֹשִֽׁי׃ <S%H512><s%> the Elkoshite

אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God קַנּ֤וֹא <S%H7072><s%> [is] jealous וְנֹקֵם֙ <S%H5358><s%> revengeth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God נֹקֵ֥ם <S%H5358><s%> revengeth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God וּבַ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> archer חֵמָ֑ה <S%H2534><s%> wrath נֹקֵ֤ם <S%H5358><s%> will take vengeance יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God לְצָרָ֔יו <S%H6862><s%> on his adversaries וְנוֹטֵ֥ר <S%H5201><s%> and he reserveth ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְאֹיְבָֽיו׃ <S%H341><s%> [wrath] for his enemies

יְהֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶ֤רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> [is] slow אַפַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H639><s%> to anger [וּגְדֹול־ כ] (וּגְדָל־ <S%H1419><s%> and great כֹּ֔חַ <S%H1419><s%> and great ק) וְנַקֵּ֖ה <S%H5352><s%> and will not at all לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יְנַקֶּ֑ה <S%H5352><s%> acquit יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> [the wicked] the LORD בְּסוּפָ֤ה <S%H5492><s%> in the whirlwind וּבִשְׂעָרָה֙ <S%H8183><s%> and in the storm דַּרְכּ֔וֹ <S%H1870><s%> hath his way וְעָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> and the clouds אֲבַ֥ק <S%H80><s%> [are] the dust רַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> of his feet

גּוֹעֵ֤ר <S%H1605><s%> He rebuketh בַּיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> the sea וַֽיַּבְּשֵׁ֔הוּ <S%H3001><s%> and drieth up וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנְּהָר֖וֹת <S%H5104><s%> all the rivers הֶֽחֱרִ֑יב <S%H2717><s%> and maketh it dry אֻמְלַ֤ל <S%H536><s%> weak בָּשָׁן֙ <S%H1316><s%> Bashan וְכַרְמֶ֔ל <S%H3760><s%> and Carmel וּפֶ֥רַח <S%H6525><s%> and the flower לְבָנ֖וֹן <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon אֻמְלָֽל׃ <S%H536><s%> weak

הָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> The mountains רָעֲשׁ֣וּ <S%H7493><s%> quake מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> because וְהַגְּבָע֖וֹת <S%H1389><s%> at him and the hills הִתְמֹגָ֑גוּ <S%H4127><s%> melt וַתִּשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> is burned הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> and the earth מִפָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> at his presence וְתֵבֵ֖ל <S%H8398><s%> yea the world וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> and all that dwell בָֽהּ׃

לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before זַעְמוֹ֙ <S%H2195><s%> angry מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who יַֽעֲמ֔וֹד <S%H5975><s%> Who can stand וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who יָק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> endure בַּחֲר֣וֹן <S%H2740><s%> in the fierceness אַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> anger חֲמָתוֹ֙ <S%H2534><s%> anger נִתְּכָ֣ה <S%H5413><s%> is poured out כָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> like fire וְהַצֻּרִ֖ים <S%H6697><s%> and the rocks נִתְּצ֥וּ <S%H5422><s%> are thrown down מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] good יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לְמָע֖וֹז <S%H4581><s%> a strong hold בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day צָרָ֑ה <S%H6869><s%> of trouble וְיֹדֵ֖עַ <S%H3045><s%> and he knoweth חֹ֥סֵי <S%H2620><s%> them that trust בֽוֹ׃

וּבְשֶׁ֣טֶף <S%H7858><s%> flood עֹבֵ֔ר <S%H5674><s%> But with an overrunning כָּלָ֖ה <S%H3617><s%> an utter end יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> he will make מְקוֹמָ֑הּ <S%H4725><s%> of the place וְאֹיְבָ֖יו <S%H341><s%> his enemies יְרַדֶּף־ <S%H7291><s%> shall pursue חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H2822><s%> thereof and darkness

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Whatever תְּחַשְּׁבוּן֙ <S%H2803><s%> What do ye imagine אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כָּלָ֖ה <S%H3617><s%> an utter end ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He עֹשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> will make לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not תָק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> shall not rise up פַּעֲמַ֖יִם <S%H6471><s%> the second time צָרָֽה׃ <S%H6869><s%> affliction

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Like סִירִ֣ים <S%H5518><s%> [as] thorns סְבֻכִ֔ים <S%H5440><s%> For while [they be] folden together וּכְסָבְאָ֖ם <S%H5435><s%> [as] drunkards סְבוּאִ֑ים <S%H5433><s%> and while they are drunken אֻ֨כְּל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> they shall be devoured כְּקַ֥שׁ <S%H7179><s%> as stubble יָבֵ֖שׁ <S%H3002><s%> dry מָלֵֽא׃ <S%H4390><s%> accomplish

מִמֵּ֣ךְ <S%H4480><s%> at יָצָ֔א <S%H3318><s%> There is [one] come out חֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H2803><s%> of thee that imagineth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> evil יֹעֵ֖ץ <S%H3289><s%> counsellor בְּלִיָּֽעַל׃ <S%H1100><s%> a wicked ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though שְׁלֵמִים֙ <S%H8003><s%> Though [they be] quiet וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> and likewise רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> and likewise many וְכֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so נָגֹ֖זּוּ <S%H1494><s%> yet thus shall they be cut down וְעָבָ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> when he shall pass through וְעִ֨נִּתִ֔ךְ <S%H6031><s%> Though I have afflicted לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no אֲעַנֵּ֖ךְ <S%H6031><s%> thee I will afflict עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> longer

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> now אֶשְׁבֹּ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> For now will I break מֹטֵ֖הוּ <S%H4132><s%> his yoke מֵֽעָלָ֑יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and וּמוֹסְרֹתַ֖יִךְ <S%H4147><s%> thy bonds אֲנַתֵּֽק׃ <S%H5423><s%> in sunder

וְצִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> hath given a commandment עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> concerning יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יִזָּרַ֥ע <S%H2232><s%> be sown מִשִּׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> concerning thee [that] no more of thy name ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer מִבֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> out of the house אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> of thy gods אַכְרִ֨ית <S%H3772><s%> will I cut off פֶּ֧סֶל <S%H6459><s%> the graven image וּמַסֵּכָ֛ה <S%H4541><s%> and the molten image אָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> I will make קִבְרֶ֖ךָ <S%H6913><s%> thy grave כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for קַלּֽוֹתָ׃ <S%H7043><s%> for thou art vile פ

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הֶהָרִ֜ים <S%H2022><s%> Behold upon the mountains רַגְלֵ֤י <S%H7272><s%> the feet מְבַשֵּׂר֙ <S%H1319><s%> of him that bringeth good tidings מַשְׁמִ֣יעַ <S%H8085><s%> that publisheth שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace חָגִּ֧י <S%H2287><s%> keep יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> O Judah חַגַּ֖יִךְ <S%H2282><s%> thy solemn feasts שַׁלְּמִ֣י <S%H7999><s%> perform נְדָרָ֑יִךְ <S%H5088><s%> thy vows כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not יוֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> shall no more ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again [לַעֲבֹור־ כ] (לַֽעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> pass בָּ֥ךְ <S%H5674><s%> pass through ק) בְּלִיַּ֖עַל <S%H1100><s%> for the wicked כֻּלֹּ֥ה <S%H3605><s%> completely נִכְרָֽת׃ <S%H3772><s%> thee he is utterly cut off
